Variables.comment3: URL should be from Design without load
Variables._comment3: Chrome downloads the files on user's downloads folder. The script will move the files from here to a more convenient path
Variables._comment4: Project location should be a path were we want to store the results after running the scripts
Variables._comment5: X and Y axis are used to set the min and max for the chart. They're also used for scoring
Variables._comment6: choose 'Yes' to apply formula to LTSpice data
